channel.title: BattleScape Bot
channel.description:
vid and svn repo with source code added, please don't delete mods, you can learn from it...
since go hard decided to ban our bot army in battlescape, here it is.
[url=https://dl.dropbox.com/s/3pc3vznunalkucl/BSBot_V1.61.jar?dl=1]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/3pc3vznunalkucl/BSBot_V1.61.jar?dl=1[/url] ( DOWNLOAD THIS IF YOU WANT TO USE THE BOT)
has cooker and fisher
decompile if you want, you can see it's 100% clean, heres the hooked client.jar [url=https://dl.dropbox.com/s/sbvo1ozdxw66wbd/client_V1.1.jar?dl=1]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/sbvo1ozdxw66wbd/client_V1.1.jar?dl=1[/url]
enjoy!
image: [img]http://i.imgur.com/FvNoM.png[/img] (credits to: me, this acc had 50m fishing xp but was banned lol)
[img]http://puu.sh/sThs[/img] ( credits to: I F A I L)
[img]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/2214/screenshot20120504at123.jpg[/img] credits to: dirty dancer
video:[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PKkjch9Cvuw]BS Bot - YouTube[/url] (watch in fullscreen hd if you want to see anything)
source code avaible at:[url=http://code.google.com/p/battlescape-bot/]battlescape-bot - BS Bot - Google Project Hosting[/url]
how to create own scripts: [url=http://code.google.com/p/battlescape-bot/wiki/HowToCreateScripts]http://code.google.com/p/battlescape-bot/wiki/HowToCreateScripts[/url]
if you believe this is a virus, dont download, and look at the source code. if you do use it, be sure to make a MASS ARMY TO REVENGE TO GO HARD
edit : new update, anti random shouldn't spam anymore even if you start script in lobby, removed all unused stuff, added grounditem support

item.title: BattleScape Bot

item.title: BattleScape Bot
item.dc:creator: @thanks_u thanks u
item.description:
@thanks_u wrote:

[quote="(N)eon, post:15, topic:441563"][quote author=marcbob link=topic=544261.msg3993490#msg3993490 date=1336936984]
I’m gonna take the public source and then I’ll decompile soulsplit’s jar and see what I can do with it. I’m sure I’ll fail but it’s worth a try.
[/quote]

Never say Never[/quote]
You just said it twice

EDIT: Not working. IT says they have updated and when i try to change DL link of the BS Client and compile i get error.
Looks like Anti Leech.
Anyway OP Nice realese.

Read full topic

item.title: BattleScape Bot
item.dc:creator: @_N_eon (N)eon
item.description:
@_N_eon wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:12, topic:441563”]Just make a youtube video of you using it.

EDIT: I dled on my mac because I considered anyone with rsps couldn’t make a good virus to go against my mac. I tried the fisher and it is actually working which I found insane.

Now whoever made this should make something like this for soulsplit and Near Reality. It could really do damage on there with good scripts.[/quote]

If somebody could make a Rocktail fishing bot for NR, i would Suck their dick.

Read full topic

item.title: BattleScape Bot
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Just make a youtube video of you using it.

EDIT: I dled on my mac because I considered anyone with rsps couldn’t make a good virus to go against my mac. I tried the fisher and it is actually working which I found insane.

Now whoever made this should make something like this for soulsplit and Near Reality. It could really do damage on there with good scripts.

Read full topic

item.title: BattleScape Bot
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I couldn’t find anything at first glance. But it does download the battlescape client, so there could be something in there. I did a quick search for anything ‘exe’ or ‘exec’, and couldn’t find anything, but it could be disguised.

In other words, just be careful

Read full topic

item.title: BattleScape Bot
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Tbh people could make a lot of rsgp if they made a bot for a rsps (big ones like NR and soulsplit) because they could just make a lot of gp on the server and then sell it for rsgp.

Still kinda stupid tho to bot a rsps but I’d take a look at this if it is legit and works (Waiting for David’s response)

Read full topic
